#: Calculate end_time for each instance type configuration period using LEAD()

records.end_time: CASE WHEN LEAD(staging.start_time) OVER (PARTITION BY staging.resource_id, staging.instance_type ORDER BY staging.start_time) IS NOT NULL THEN LEAD(staging.start_time) OVER (PARTITION BY staging.resource_id, staging.instance_type ORDER BY staging.start_time) - 0.000001 ELSE NULL END
